[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1632214500598{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Website-banner-3.png?id=13398) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

f:CEL

(falanx Cyber Exposure Level)

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right center” css=”.vc_custom_1632214530377{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Website-banner-3.png?id=13398) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

f:CEL

(falanx Cyber Exposure Level)

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1632215547402{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1599745746523{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:30px”]

What is f:CEL?

[vc_column_text]

Wouldn’t you like to know how cyber criminals see your organisation? Are you worth attacking? f:CEL assesses your overall risk of being attacked or breached based on how attractive you look to a criminal, simulating the reconnaissance they do when picking a target.

The findings are displayed to you as a Falanx Cyber Exposure Level score. The f:CEL score comprises three elements:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1595431128178{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”square-icons” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:50px|padding_right_large:60px|padding_left_large:60px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_right_small:0px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Digital Risk

How secure is your website, and is there information on the Dark Web that could be used to target you?

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

External IP Risk

How secure are your public-facing servers?

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433029046{margin-right: -20px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″]

Organisational Risk

How much do you do operationally to minimise your risk of attack?

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

You will receive a report with your overall score, the vulnerabilities that were discovered, and our recommendations for how to fix them and improve your score. Following the initial sign-up report, f:CEL is then performed regularly so that a business can keep track of its security posture. f:CEL can also be used to assess your key suppliers to ensure that they are not introducing an unacceptable level of cyber risk to your business.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1596543124502{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/680838653″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1632215056648{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Background.jpg?id=9249) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column width=”1/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

How it works…

[vc_column_text]Step 1 – Answer questionnaire
Spend 5 minutes completing an online questionnaire (multiple choice) for a full f:CEL score.

Step 2 – Notification of report
Email notification within 24 hours.

Step 3 – Download report
Download your f:CEL report via a secure portal.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1596543124502{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Who should use f:CEL?

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Board of Directors

f:CEL run quarterly, provides Board-level Cyber Exposure Level scores with recommendations to further improve your security posture.

Investors/PE Houses

Enables Private Equity houses and investors to fully understand the cyber risk within their portfolios and take appropriate action to protect valuable assets.

Supply chain specialists

Evaluate your supply chain to understand your supply chains’ cyber exposure levels.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600878087267{margin-top: 0px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:100px|margin_top_medium:100px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Insurers

Understand the risk profile of each organisation for whom you have written a cyber security policy and grade them according to risk exposure level.

MSPs

Check your own surface and extended surface across your entire customer and supplier network for cyber exposure and prioritise those organisations you need to de-risk.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”250px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1599745746523{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:30px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:30px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:30px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:30px”]

How much does it cost?

[vc_column_text]

To ensure f:CEL is accessible to all we have created two different pricing options:

  1. A one-off report to see how you look is available for a one-time fee of £199.00
  2. Want to see that initial report, take action, and see how your score improves as a result? Up to 4 reports in a 12 month period for £499.00

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1634734123761{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″]
[vc_empty_space height=”60px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”]

Register your interest

    [vc_empty_space height=”10px” el_class=”mobile-hidden”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”5″ equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1640340892060{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_single_image image=”14228″ img_size=”medium”][vc_column_text]To further protect your organisation, Falanx works closely with New Dawn Risk Group, a Lloyd’s insurance broker specialising in cyber, professional indemnity, and directors’ & officers’ insurance.

    Learn more about New Dawn Risk[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601389135762{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

    Testimonials

    [/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

    “I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

    Claudia Zimmer
    Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

    “The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

    Mitchell Smith
    Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

    “We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

    James Myhill
    Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

    “Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

    Cyber Security Manager
    Leading Specialist Bank
    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
